episode_event_anniversary_2021/4001_1201: Lillie! You sure you want me to be your opponent?

There’ve gotta be tons of sync pairs out there who
would jump at the opportunity to battle you, yeah!

I’ve already decided that I want you as my first
opponent, Professor Kukui!

Though...now that you’re actually here...I’m
feeling kind of nervous!

Oh no—my sweet Lillie... This is her big moment!
Should I do something to help?

We only have one job to do right now, and that’s
to cheer them on with everything we’ve got!

You can do it, Lillie! Professor Kukui! We’re
rooting for you!

Back in Alola, you helped me out more times than
I could count, Professor Kukui.

I wouldn’t be who I am today if not for all of the
amazing people who supported me along the way.

This battle is for you—to show you all how truly
thankful I am!
Come on out, Lunala!

Oho! You partnered up with the Legendary
Pokémon Lunala?!
Aw yeah, I’m into it! As for me...
I gotta go with my buddy Lycanroc!

Man, it makes me so happy to see how much you
kids have grown!

I hope we can all keep working together to
make Alola— Nah...Pasio! No...
...the WORLD a more fun place to be!
Me too!
Hmph... You’ve gotten strong, Lillie.

You’re not just my little sister. You’re also
my rival!
Bring it on, Lillie!
I’ll show you my full power, Professor Kukui!

Lunala and I are coming at you with everything
we’ve got!
episode_event_anniversary_2021/4002_1201: Brilliant match! What a great start!

Next up, we have N... Come, trust in the bond
between you and your Pokémon, and show us all
a glorious victory!
But wait—before we move on to the match...
N, would you care to grace us with a speech?
A...speech?

The young master heard about your dream and
wanted to support your message somehow.

It would please him greatly if you could share a
few words.

Well, uh... I’m not really accustomed to
giving speeches.
So...I suppose I’ll just speak from my heart.

Humans and Pokémon can form strong connections
together. Aid one another. It’s why we make the
best partners.

But in order for that to happen, we have to
accept ideas that are different from ours instead
of shunning them.

Seeing Pokémon and Trainers form sync pairs,
seeing how they find common ground with one
another and battle together in teams...

Pasio is about as close to my ideal as anywhere
can be.

But darkness still exists in this world, and reality
can be a harsh place to live in sometimes.

That is why today, I want all of you to turn to
your partner Pokémon and remind yourselves of
the irreplaceable bond you share!
Show your Pokémon your true, unwavering love!

If all of us can do that, I believe we can change
this world like a chemical reaction.

That takes care of that, then... Are you ready,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

As you’ve already seen once today, we get to
choose our own opponents at the Unity Gala.

I’d like to use this battle to express how grateful
I am to have met so many wonderful sync pairs
on Pasio.
So I’d like you to—
Hold up! I’m the one you wanna battle!

Hey, you can’t just jump the gun like that!
N! Pick ME to be your opponent!

I’d love to battle you both, but I can’t exactly
choose between you...

Ah, I know! Why don’t we have a double battle?
You two against [Name:PlayerNickname ]
and me.
I like the sound of that! Let’s do it, Hilbert!

All right! Look out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
And you, too, N! We won’t go easy on you!

*chuckle* I’m glad we found a solution, even if it
is a bit much.

Now then, let’s get this lovefest back on track!
It’s time to battle!
episode_event_anniversary_2021/4003_1201: Now, Rayquaza!

Simply wonderful. You and Rayquaza are in
perfect harmony with one another!

Well, I believe you deserve some credit for
helping me dissolve much of the mystery
surrounding Rayquaza.

Ah... Are you referring to Hoenn’s ancient lore
and the Draconid people?

Indeed. Thanks to you, I gained a deeper
understanding of Rayquaza. I chose to battle
you today to show you how much that’s paid off.

That’s all you, Steven. You’re the one who was
curious about the relationship between Mega
Evolution and meteorites in the first place, right?
That’s true, I suppose...
I did battle a Rayquaza once before, though.

If not for the help of a certain formidable Trainer,
I would have been in deep trouble.

That battle remains burned into my memory to
this day.

I can still see it clearly in my mind—that Trainer
standing defiantly before the might of Rayquaza.

Now that I’ve partnered up with this Rayquaza
here on Pasio...

I hope that the pair of us can grow strong enough
to surpass him!

No wonder you were so focused on researching
Rayquaza back then.

Besides, there’s another Trainer on Pasio who’s
partnered up with a Rayquaza.
I’d like to battle her someday, too.

And this time, I think I’ll be able to approach
a battle against Rayquaza a bit differently
than before.
You do hate to lose, don’t you, Steven.

If I’m going to battle, I’d obviously rather win
than lose!
Just like I intend to defeat you right now!

I won’t go down so easily! Prepare to be dazzled
by my aquatic illusions!
Let’s do this, Rayquaza!
